text:
Kinnek - HQ`d in NYC is building the first and largest online marketplace for small business, come join our team!

Looking for Senior Frontend Dev and Senior Backend Devs

Frontend- 5+ years Banckend- 7+ years (python heavy)

Kinnek has raised $31.5M led by Matrix Partners and Thrive Capital.

We`re a product organization with 50 employees. We`re looking for the best developers in NYC right now to join our 10 person dev team.

Interested in hearing more? nathalie@kinnek.com
